about_the_game:
Worlds brought to life by H.P. Lovecraft and R.W. Chambers combined in the form of a pixelart point&click game.
As Solomon Hill, investigate the mysterious death of your twin brother and an ancient plot to bring back the lost city of Carcosa and its resident Hastur, known as the King in Yellow.



Explore the quiet town of Clinton, MA with Solomon and learn its history along with the secrets of its individual inhabitants. Discover the hidden threads of the Hill family history, especially the archaeological discoveries made by Solomon's father and his mysterious partner while excavating in the Sahara desert. Immerse yourself in the madness brought into the world by powerful beings from beyond time and space. Prevent the King in Yellow from reaching Earth... or don't.

This game is an initiative created by one person, if you are interested, add "The Yellow Sign" to your Wishlist.

FEATURE LIST:

  • Stylized pixel art
  • An original story combining themes from R.W. Chambers' "King in Yellow" and Cthulhu mythos by H.P. Lovecraft
  • Classic point-and-click mechanics combined with NPC interrogation (later in the game)
  • Opportunity to explore the city and discover additional stories
  • Your choices matter and lead to different endings
